website_summaries.verdict: Updated design for 14-way top and improved compartments for organization. Sleek and modern that comes in attractive colors.
pros: New design lets wedges sit flush in bag with no more overhang
Mesh protective layer over a cushioned encasement for clubs
Cooler has plenty of room and is water-resistant, so there’s no need to worry about condensation penetrating the bag
cons: Not designed for horizontal carrying due to the lack of a handle
Some feel base is unsteady and could easily get knocked over

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: A good bag. Only setback is there is no handle at the bottom of the bag to grab on to when carrying horizontal. Like when loading in to a trunk or truck bed. So it’s a little awkward but still a good bag for the money.
customer_reviews.author: JHalstead

customer_reviews.title: Great cart bag, not a great range bag
customer_reviews.text: Overall the bag is good. Plenty of storage and the club slots are great. The cooler pocket can hold about four 12 oz. cans, I would avoid putting ice in the pocket though cause there is a ventilated hole at the bottom and it will leak water into other pockets as well. The base of the bag is not the best as well, I learned not to load the bag with balls and accessories, that helps with the stability. It’s worth buying, great cart bag, not a great range bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Not a good cart bag, no strap pass through
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but I’m disappointed that it doesn’t have a place to run the cart strap through...i would’ve returned but pulled all the tags and plastic off before I realized there is no pass through for the golf cart strap
customer_reviews.author: Dana Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Bag keeps falling!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. The base is too small so the bag keeps falling. Dented our wood floor too. Was gonna return but then I tried wrestling the bag into balance and it worked...for awhile. Unfortunately, return period then expired. Falling again. DON’T BUY.
customer_reviews.author: bomaha

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay upright!
customer_reviews.text: An average quality bag for the price. In fact, I'm already shopping for a replacement because it falls over so frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Matt O

customer_reviews.title: Great cart bag!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bad. Well made and looks great. Lots of pocket space. Well balanced. Came with rain cover in the bottom of one of the large pockets. I like the 14 club slots instead of the 5/6 slot bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Whitty

customer_reviews.title: awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag, very organized pockets absolutely, well made....... love it
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag , very light and it stays upright in the garage with out falling over. Will be enjoying this bag come spring !
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Can’t secure the bag to cart...
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t a spot to weave the cart strap through the bag to secure the bag to the cart. Just a ridiculous oversight to the design. I love the colors and the amount of storage, but it’s worthless if the bag falls off the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Garner

customer_reviews.title: attractive, lightweight and practical!
customer_reviews.text: this bag was on backorder through every other site. gifted it to a friend, came on time and he absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Bag
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Lightweight - more than enough pockets - very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Nordine

customer_reviews.title: Very avg bag but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Ehhhh idk. Not bad. It is what it is for the price I guess. No complaints really just not exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: jaime zapar

customer_reviews.title: A lot of pockets and individual divider for each club.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of pockets and individual divider for each club.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Weyant

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf 2019 Chev Org Cart Bag
product_meta.description:
Bold colors, stylish graphics and all the organization you need. Each pocket was designed to filet open for maximum storage with easy opening and closing.

Features:

14-Way top with added grab handlesNon-stadium top that allows wedges to sit flush, eliminating club hangGlove attachmentPen holderSpacious cooler pocketWater-resistant, Velour-lined valuables pocket2 Full length apparel pocketsQuick-access accessory pocketWeight: 4.8 lbs
feature_bullets: New 14 Way Top with added grab handles
New, Non stadium top that allows wedges to sit flush, eliminating hang
Spacious Cooler Pocket and Water Resistant Velour Lined Valuables Pocket
